attributes.action: Ensure Critical Medical Staff Have Free Hospital Car Parking Facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My husband suffered a brain haemorrhage in December 2006 and was in the ICU at a well-known hospital. I was shocked to discover that not only did the dedicated staff have to pay, albeit it a subsidised car parking charge, they were not guaranteed a parking space! Some were forced to park in the high priced NCP car park nearby! These people are life savers and should be treated with the respect they deserve!
